name: Deviants - Paragon Project
description:
Koshi, a member of the Enforcers, must fight against the rebellious Deviant army and find out what are they planning to use the Paragon Project for.

Deviants is a platformer shooter highly inspired by classics like Megaman X.

This demo contains the first level of the game.

Keyboard controls:

Move - Directional Arrows

Shoot - Z

Jump - X

Dash - C

Pause - Enter
